懸.definition: to hang or suspend; to worry; public announcement; unresolved; baseless; without foundation

懸垂.definition: to hang down; to dangle; to be suspended

懸壺.definition: (literary) to practice medicine; to work as a pharmacist

懸壺濟世.definition: practice medicine or pharmacy to help the people or public

懸崖勒馬.definition: lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom); fig. to act in the nick of time

懸崖峭壁.definition: (idiom) sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces

懸崖絕壁.definition: sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)

懸帶.definition: sling (for immobilizing an injured limb etc)

懸念.definition: suspense in a movie, play etc; concern for sb's welfare

懸掛式滑翔機.pinyin: xuan2 gua4 shi4 hua2 xiang2 ji1

懸樑刺股.definition: to study assiduously and tirelessly (idiom); see also 頭懸梁，錐刺股|头悬梁，锥刺股[tou2 xuan2 liang2 , zhui1 ci4 gu3]

懸河.definition: "hanging" river (an embanked one whose riverbed is higher than the surrounding floodplain); (literary) waterfall; cataract; (fig.) torrent of words

懸浮.definition: to float (in the air etc); suspension

懸盪.definition: to hang suspended; to dangle; (fig.) to be in limbo; to be in a state of uncertainty

懸空.definition: to hang in the air; suspended in midair; (fig.) uncertain

懸空寺.definition: Xuankong Temple or Suspended Temple near Yanyuan in Shanxi

懸羊頭賣狗肉.pinyin: xuan2 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4
懸羊頭賣狗肉.definition: see 掛羊頭賣狗肉|挂羊头卖狗肉[gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4]

懸而未決.definition: pending a decision; hanging in the balance

懸賞令.definition: an order to post a reward (for the capture of a criminal)
